history.proof: intros x u v. unfold prod_scal, prod_plus. scongruence use: @scal_distr_l unfold: AbelianGroup.sort, ModuleSpace.sort, snd, ModuleSpace.AbelianGroup, fst.

original: intros x u v. unfold prod_scal, prod_plus. rewrite (ModuleSpace.ax3 V). rewrite (ModuleSpace.ax3 V). rewrite (ModuleSpace.ax3 V). rewrite (scal_distr_l). rewrite (scal_distr_l). rewrite (scal_distr_l). rewrite (scal_distr_r). rewrite (scal_distr_r). rewrite (scal_distr_r). rewrite (scal_distr_r). rewrite (scal_distr_r). reflexivity.
